message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get something too. Let's see how this goes!
My turn! Let's be reasonable. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? It's a good deal before inflation eats away at it further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 60/40 split is more fair considering the inflation. Let's get this done before we lose too much.
This is getting ridiculous! Let's just split it evenly and stop wasting time. 50/50, take it or leave it.  We're losing money with every passing round.
